en: Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig have been tidying the house.
zh: 猪妈妈和猪爸爸在收拾房子。

en: Mummy Pig and I found this old box in the attic!
zh: 猪妈妈和我在阁楼里发现了这个旧箱子。

en: Can anyone guess what's inside?
zh: 谁能猜出里面有什么吗？

en: Hmmm, nope!
It's full of musical instruments!
Wow!
They are a bit old and dusty.
This is the violin I used to play when I was little!
zh: 这是我小时候拉过的小提琴！

en: Mummy? Can you play your violin?
zh: 妈妈？你能拉小提琴来听听吗？

en: I haven't played it for a long time!
zh: 我已经很久没有拉过它了！

en: Please, Mummy! Please play it!
zh: 求你了，妈妈！拉来听听嘛！

en: I hope I haven't forgotten how...
Bravo!
Hurray!
Mummy? Can I play the violin?
zh: 妈妈？我能拉一下小提琴吗？

en: Hold it like this.
Yes, Mummy.
Oh, dear. I do not think it is meant to sound like that.
zh: 哦，天啊。我想小提琴的声音不是这样的。

en: George wants to try.
Hold it like this, George.
Oh!
That does not sound quite right, either.
zh: 小提琴的声音也不是这样的。

en: The violin is too hard to play!
Peppa! Maybe you would do better with this tin drum,.
zh: 佩奇！也许你更适合打鼓。

en: Thank you, Daddy.
That sounds better!
Peppa loves playing the drum.
Lovely.
Yes, it sounds very nice.
This is Daddy Pig's old accordion.
zh: 这是猪爸爸的旧手风琴。

en: I used to play this to Mummy Pig when we first met...
zh: 我和猪妈妈第一次见面时，我拉的就是手风琴。。。

en: Oh... Daddy Pig. I remember this tune.
zh: 哦。。。猪爸爸。我记得这首曲子。

en: George wants to play the accordion, too!
Are you sure, George?
The accordion is quite difficult.
George. The accordion is almost as difficult to play as my drum.
zh: 乔治。拉手风琴差不多和我的打鼓一样难。

en: Ok, George.
Maybe George is a bit too little to play the accordion.
zh: 也许乔治太小还不能玩手风琴。

en: Daddy? What other instruments are in the box?
zh: 爸爸？箱子里还有什么乐器吗？

en: Just this horn!
Can I try?
You have to blow it very hard!
That does not sound right.
It's impossible!
I think I used to be able to play it...
zh: 我想我以前好像吹响过它。。。

en: That really does not sound right.
Maybe it just needs someone big and strong like me!
zh: 也许这个只有我这么强壮的人来吹才行！

en: That does not sound right, either.
Peppa's right, it is impossible to play.
zh: 佩奇说得对，不可能吹响它。

en: Never mind, Daddy Pig.Just stick to the accordion.
zh: 没关系的，猪爸爸。只要拉手风琴就好了。

en: You play it beautifully!
Well, I do play it quite nicely,
zh: 好吧，我的手风琴是拉得很不错，

en: even if I say so myself.
And I'll play my violin!
And I will play my drum!
Mummy Pig plays the violin.
Daddy Pig plays the accordion.
Peppa plays the drum.
But what instrument will George play?
zh: 但是乔治该用什么乐器呢？

en: George is blowing the horn!
Mummy couldn't play the horn and Daddy couldn't play it.
zh: 妈妈吹不响那只号角，爸爸也吹不响那只号角。

en: And even I couldn't play it!
zh: 甚至我也吹不响那只号角！

en: But George can play it.
